Description:
IN/WJG/13/250322/01 - 312380473.
You have failed to have your Local Exhaust Ventilation (LEV) systems which are used to control exposure to inhalable dust, a substance hazardous to health, thoroughly examined and tested within the previous 14 months.

IN/WJG/13/250322/02 - 312380511.
You have failed to carry out a suitable and sufficient assessment of the risks to the health of your employees from exposure to noise.
